comment1: Color for the pattern highlighting. Color - GREY. the last one is opacity
comment2: Color on sidebar of the minimap. Color - GREEN
coment3: Array size to hold active editor. 10 - Array able to hold 10 active editors's symbols. So when going back to previous active editor, it wont need to re-extract the symbols again. User can trigger `refresh tree`, `reset`, or change active editor to trigger this array size changes.
